title: Update business email ID in Contact section

requirements.text: Update the Contact section email contact shown in `frontend/src/components/sections/ContactSection.tsx` (currently displayed as "info@goldenneedle.com") to display the business email ID exactly as: "thegoldenneedle07".

quotes: Add E mail ID as thegoldenneedle07

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact Information card in the Contact section shows the email text exactly as "thegoldenneedle07".
The email is displayed using the existing muted styling consistent with the surrounding contact details (i.e., the same `text-muted-foreground` styling is preserved).
No other contact fields (phone numbers, location, form fields) are changed.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/hooks/*` and `frontend/src/components/ui/*` that are listed as immutable paths in system context.
nonGoals: Adding backend email sending functionality (the contact form remains frontend-only as it is today).
Creating or guessing an email domain (do not change "thegoldenneedle07" into a different address).
